16.customerMessage1: I never received my Comfrt sweat top and pant?
16.AgentMessage1:
Comfrt: Hi, Camilla. I'm sorry to hear that! The Cloud Zip Hoodie is on pre-order and will be shipped 84 days after purchase. Please expect it by March 8. The tracking link will be sent as soon as your order ships, so please keep an eye on your email inbox and spam/promo folders for it.

As for the Cloud Sweatpants, we sent it last December 16! You should have received tracking information via email. Please check your spam and promo folders, as sometimes emails end up there. Can you share what you see?

send_to_cs: Send to CS for coupon code requests
escalate: Always include the cx name & email in your ESC notes
ESC to confirm accurate product measurements for the cx
ESC immediately if the cx mentions the code EMPLOYEE50
dos_and_donts: They don't offer callbacks, don't suggest this to cx
promo_and_exclusions: SuperCircle Credits can be used at any time on any items (regular, discounted/on sale) and even during sitewide sales
SuperCircle Credits can't be combined with another discount code at the same time
Customers can apply discount codes to items that are on sale if its a discount code specific to the sale.

20.SystemMessage2: tentree: Hey this is Jordan , how can I help you?
20.customerMessage1: Hi, the tentree box I got for my husband came with a jacket that some the snap buttons don't work/snap closed
20.AgentMessage1: tentree: Sorry about that! This is definitely not the quality we want you to expect from us. Can you please send me a photo of the items that you received, along with your order number and email address?
20.customerMessage4: I will also send a video of the issue with snaps
20.AgentMessage2:
tentree: Thanks for sending that over! Unfortunately, we can only accept return or exchange requests for unworn, unwashed items within 30 days of purchase for our Canadian and US customers. You can review our full return policy here: https://tentree.attn.tv/aGzH_PbtPwZz

After checking, I see that you placed Order #607991 on September 28, 2025, which is now beyond the return window.
